PagePortable.Title: Gerador de cubos - Grupos de cubos

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Gerador de cubos - Grupos de cubos
Cubos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_Z_AGRUPAMENTOCUBOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.CUBO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM Z_CUBOS X WHERE X.ACESSORESTRITO <> 'S' OR X.HANDLE IN(SELECT Z.CUBO FROM Z_CUBOUSUARIOS Z WHERE Z.USUARIO = @USUARIO))) AND (A.AGRUPAMENTO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2295_at3018_hs7d775b06.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
